verses.verse: Now there <S%H6817>cried<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to <S%H477>Elisha,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead.<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Now the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> for himself my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3206>children<s%> to be <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>"

<S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>her,<s%> "What shall I do for <S%H5046>you?<s%> Tell <S%H3426>me:<s%> what do you have in the <S%H1004>house?<s%>" She <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> has nothing in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> except a <S%H610>pot<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> <S%H3627>containers<s%> from of <S%H2351>all<s%> your <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> even <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3627>containers.<s%> <S%H4591>Don't<s%> borrow just a few.

You shall go <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> on you and on your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and pour <S%H3332>out<s%> into all those <S%H3627>containers;<s%> and you shall set <S%H5265>aside<s%> that which is <S%H4392>full.<s%>"

So she <S%H3212>went<s%> from <S%H5462>him,<s%> and shut the <S%H1817>door<s%> on her and <S%H1157>on<s%> her <S%H1121>sons;<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> the containers to <S%H3332>her,<s%> and she poured out.

It <S%H3627>happened,<s%> when the containers were <S%H4390>full,<s%> that she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> me another <S%H3627>container.<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3627>her,<s%> "There isn't another container." The <S%H8081>oil<s%> stopped <S%H5975>flowing.<s%>

Then she <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7999>pay<s%> your <S%H5386>debt;<s%> and you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> on the <S%H3498>rest.<s%>"

It fell on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> to <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%> where there was a <S%H1419>prominent<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%> and she <S%H2388>persuaded<s%> him to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%> So it <S%H1767>was,<s%> that as often as he passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> he <S%H5493>turned<s%> in there to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> "See <S%H3045>now,<s%> I perceive that this is a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H5674>passes<s%> by us <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

Please let us <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5944>room<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall.<s%> Let us <S%H7760>set<s%> for him there a <S%H4296>bed,<s%> a <S%H7979>table,<s%> a <S%H3678>chair,<s%> and a <S%H4501>lamp<s%> <S%H935>stand.<s%> It shall be, when he comes to <S%H5493>us,<s%> that he shall turn in there."
One <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5493>there,<s%> and he turned into the <S%H5944>room<s%> and lay <S%H7901>there.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> this <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%>" When he had <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5975>her,<s%> she stood before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Say now to <S%H2729>her,<s%> 'Behold, you have cared for us with all this <S%H2731>care.<s%> What is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H3426>you?<s%> Would you like to be <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> or to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army?<s%>'" She <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> my own <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "What then is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H1522>her?<s%>" Gehazi <S%H559>answered,<s%> "Most <S%H61>certainly<s%> she has no <S%H1121>son,<s%> and her <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H2204>old.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> <S%H7121>her.<s%>" When he had called <S%H5975>her,<s%> she stood in the <S%H6607>door.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "At this <S%H4150>season,<s%> when the <S%H6256>time<s%> comes <S%H2416>around,<s%> you will <S%H2263>embrace<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>" She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H113>"No,<s%> my lord, you <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> do not <S%H3576>lie<s%> to your <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> at that <S%H4150>season,<s%> when the <S%H6256>time<s%> came <S%H2416>around,<s%> as <S%H477>Elisha<s%> had said to <S%H1696>her.<s%>
When the <S%H3206>child<s%> was <S%H1431>grown,<s%> it happened one <S%H3117>day<s%> that he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H7114>reapers.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> "My <S%H7218>head!<s%> My <S%H7218>head!<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H5375>"Carry<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother.<s%>"
When he had <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H935>him,<s%> and brought him to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> on her <S%H1290>knees<s%> until <S%H6672>noon,<s%> and then <S%H4191>died.<s%>
She went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him on the <S%H4296>bed<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the door on <S%H3318>him,<s%> and went out.

She <S%H7121>called<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H7971>send<s%> me <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5288>servants,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> that I may <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and come <S%H7725>again.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why would you want <S%H1980>go<s%> to him <S%H3117>today?<s%> It is neither new <S%H2320>moon<s%> nor <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%>" She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"It<s%>'s alright."

Then she <S%H2280>saddled<s%> a <S%H860>donkey,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H5090>"Drive,<s%> and go <S%H3212>forward!<s%> <S%H6113>Don't<s%> slow <S%H7392>down<s%> for <S%H559>me,<s%> unless I ask you to."

So she <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%> It <S%H376>happened,<s%> when the man of <S%H430>God<s%> saw her afar <S%H7200>off,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H1975>"Behold,<s%> there is the <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%>

Please <S%H7323>run<s%> now to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>her,<s%> and ask <S%H7965>her,<s%> 'Is it well with <S%H7965>you?<s%> Is it well with your <S%H376>husband?<s%> Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H3206>child?<s%>'" She <S%H559>answered,<s%> "It is <S%H7965>well.<s%>"

When she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> she <S%H2388>caught<s%> hold of his <S%H7272>feet.<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> to thrust her <S%H1920>away;<s%> but the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Leave her <S%H7503>alone;<s%> for her <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4843>troubled<s%> within <S%H3068>her;<s%> and Yahweh has <S%H5956>hidden<s%> it from <S%H5046>me,<s%> and has not told me."
Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Did I <S%H7592>desire<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H113>lord?<s%> <S%H559>Didn't<s%> I say, Do not deceive <S%H7952>me?<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> "Tuck your <S%H4975>cloak<s%> into your <S%H2296>belt,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and go your <S%H3212>way.<s%> If you <S%H4672>meet<s%> any <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H1288>don't<s%> greet <S%H376>him;<s%> and if anyone <S%H1288>greets<s%> <S%H6030>you,<s%> don't answer him again. Then <S%H7760>lay<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child.<s%>"

The <S%H517>mother<s%> of the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and as your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H6965>you.<s%>" He arose, and followed <S%H3212>her.<s%>

<S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7760>them,<s%> and laid the <S%H4938>staff<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child;<s%> but there was neither <S%H6963>voice,<s%> nor <S%H7182>hearing.<s%> Therefore he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5046>him,<s%> and told <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "The <S%H5288>child<s%> has not <S%H6974>awakened.<s%>"
When <S%H477>Elisha<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5288>behold,<s%> the child was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
He went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5462>therefore,<s%> and shut the <S%H1817>door<s%> on them <S%H8147>both,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> on the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> on his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and his <S%H3709>hands<s%> on his <S%H3709>hands.<s%> He <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself on <S%H1320>him;<s%> and the flesh of the <S%H3206>child<s%> grew <S%H2552>warm.<s%>

Then he <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> once <S%H259>back<s%> and <S%H259>forth;<s%> and went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself on <S%H5288>him.<s%> Then the child <S%H2237>sneezed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

He <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> this <S%H7767>Shunammite!<s%>" So he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H935>her.<s%> When she had come in to <S%H559>him,<s%> he said, "Take <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H1121>son.<s%>"

Then she went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> herself to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and she took <S%H5375>up<s%> her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out.<s%>

<S%H477>Elisha<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%> There was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him;<s%> and he said to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H8239>"Set<s%> on the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5518>pot,<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> <S%H5138>stew<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>"

<S%H259>One<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> of it <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H6498>gourds<s%> his <S%H899>lap<s%> <S%H4393>full,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6398>shred<s%> them into the <S%H5518>pot<s%> of <S%H5138>stew;<s%> for they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> recognize them.

So they poured <S%H3332>out<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%> It <S%H398>happened,<s%> as they were eating of the <S%H5138>stew,<s%> that they cried <S%H6817>out,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H376>"Man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> there is <S%H4194>death<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot!<s%>" They <S%H3201>could<s%> not eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Then <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H7058>meal.<s%>" He <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H5518>pot;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Pour <S%H3332>out<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat.<s%>" There was no <S%H1697>harm<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> from Baal Shalishah <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and fresh ears of <S%H3759>grain<s%> in his <S%H6861>sack.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat.<s%>"

His <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"What,<s%> should I set this <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men?<s%>" But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat;<s%> for thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'They will eat, and will have some left <S%H3498>over.<s%>'"
So he <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H398>them,<s%> and they ate, and <S%H3498>left<s%> some of <S%H1697>it,<s%> according to the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
